The NYC General Assembly is composed of dozens of groups working together to organize and set the vision for the #occupywallstreet movement. This is our official website.

All donations are tax deductible. Don’t be alarmed when you end up on nicanet.org and are asked to confirm – this is the method that our sponsor, Alliance for Global Justice, provided to the NYCGA.
